description:
In this short course, weâ€™ll look at the Seaside Web Framework, covering topics such as:

   • Introduction to Smalltalk
   • Introduction to Seaside 3.0 (new!)
   • Persistence solutions
   • Integration with jQuery and other Ajax tools
   • If time permits, the Pier content management system

Demonstrations will be performed with the Open Source Squeak programming environment, although the knowledge will also apply to other environments, such as VisualWorks, GNU Smalltalk, or GemStone/S.

After completing this course, youâ€™ll have a basic understanding of building and deploying a web application using Seaside.
title: Introduction to Web Application Development Using Smalltalk Seaside
